Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) convert chemical energy into electrical energy at high temperature with very high energy efficiency and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: However, repeated redox and thermal cycles in harsh environments cause mechanical deformation or crack formation under pressure derived from SOCs stacked up.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: Flexible ceramic components can provide SOCs with thermomechanical shock tolerance to relieve such stress and to achieve long-lasting operation.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: Here, a next-generation flexible SOC (F-SOC) with a bendable 3 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (3YSZ) electrolyte is carefully controlled by the composition-dependent phase transition, grain size, and surface roughness.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: Furthermore, the cell production includes simple and cost-effective techniques including tape-casting, screen-printing, and co-firing processes, ensuring its reproducibility.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: The F-SOC fulfills noteworthy 4.27% degradation in on-off cycles for 500 h, producing a reasonable power output.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability

Sentencas: The results described here can establish a foundation towards next-generation flexible SOCs with thermomechanical shock resistance, and they could be applied in various research fields such as photovoltaics, flexible electronics, and sensors.
Titulo: Next-generation flexible solid oxide fuel cells with high thermomechanical stability
